Brendan

item.title: Dont make 503-508 client or server they are illegal
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

letspkemscape:

only if they got webclients

They could have a site dedicated to a server. Like Moparscape, made a webclient, but no specific server assigned to it. That’s not really a problem. It’s more a problem when its a client and server and a site. That’s when it get’s Jagex’s legal attention, especially if the owner is making some good hardy money.

Read full topic
item.source: Dont make 503-508 client or server they are illegal

item.title: Dont make 503-508 client or server they are illegal
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

letspkemscape:

only if they got webclients

What is your problem.

ALL of what we do is illegal and if Jagex wanted to they could sue every motherfucking person who has even logged into a private server.

Brendan

Read full topic
item.source: Dont make 503-508 client or server they are illegal

item.title: Dont make 503-508 client or server they are illegal
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

letspkemscape:

Dont make them or you will be sued for everything you have

Omg. Did you read Yz85racer’s thread? ALL private server’s can give Jagex grounds to sue, but it’s unlikely they won’t because you are not using private server’s for profit (most of the time).

This topic is going to get you muted, no doubt.

Read full topic

item.title: Dont make 503-508 client or server they are illegal

item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:4, topic:231159”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=304434.msg2440251#msg2440251 date=1221424635]
Dont make 317-474 servers they are illegal

Your a dumbass. it basically sounds like what i said above.
[/quote]

Jagex only will “Potentially” Sue 400+ Servers/clients,

Anything below that is fine as jagex don’t give a shit,

As private servers knowledge increase,

So does our chance of getting sued.[/quote]
So, if we had a erotic 399, we’d be safe fo shizzle?
